famous Market Street, just off the corner of State
and Market Streets. Great location for any retail
user. Right in between Haagen Dazs and the

to stay away from any uses involving cooking.
S Market Street in Historic Downtown Charleston

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Ideal retail location on South Market Street between Crabby Jacks and Sunglass Hut.The space has frontage on Market Street with it's own awning and has frontage on the courtyard behind the building.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 1,450 SF Retail Space for Lease on Market Street

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Steps away from East Bay Street and Meeting Street.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Located in Charlestonâ€™s tourist district across the street from the Historic Charleston City Market. The available space has been renovated with a new storefront, HVAC, electric, plumbing, restrooms. The space is ready for a tenant to move in.

Nearby retailers include: Beef Jerkey Outlet, Aussie Outfitters, Loose Lucy's, Sunglass Hut, Caviar & Bananas, and Tervis

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Retail - Commercial space downtown for lease

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Great Market Street retail space with huge windows right across Market Street from the Charleston Place Hotel. 1,561 square feet of mostly open retail space. Base Rent is $32.00 NNN and CAMTI is estimated at $8.50. Tenant pays utilities and janitorial.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Great Market Street retail space with huge windows right across Market Street from the Charleston Place Hotel.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Rare opportunity to lease prime retail space on Broad Street. Broad Street is the main corridor that bisects the lower Charleston peninsula and boasts plenty of local and tourist foot traffic. The floor plan features an open layout with a large storefront. Great potential for a beautiful art gallery, boutique shop, or any street retail use.

Rare opportunity to lease retail space on Broad Street. Broad Street is the main corridor that bisects the lower peninsula and boasts plenty of local and tourist foot traffic. The floor-plan features an open layout, with potential for a beautiful art gallery, boutique or any street retail use.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 2,848 SF Ground Floor Retail Space Available

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Rare opportunity to lease prime retail space on King Street. The space has excellent visibility, high foot traffic and 38 feet of frontage. The property is near numerous restaurants, new hotels, high-end street shopping and more. National retailers just steps away include Apple, Williams Sonoma, Sephora, Anthropologie, Starbucks and H&M. King Street is the Premier Charleston shopping and hospitality corridor with traffic from tourists, locals and college students. Unique layout is ideal for restaurant, retail or service use.

*Owner is willing to consider subdividing for credit Tenants*

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Rare opportunity to lease prime retail space on King Street

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Construction has begun for a June 2021 Delivery. With excellent visibility and exceptional access to everywhere in Charleston and plenty of walkable amenities, 677 King will be a welcomed addition to the Charleston sky line. Two ground floor retail spaces and onsite parking will be topped with 3 efficient floors of ~17,000 sf each of Class A office space and then the 5th floor of ~13,000 sf with a private outside terrace.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: New Class A Retail Space on Charleston Peninsula
